scroll-snap-type.name: scroll-snap-type
scroll-snap-type.value: none | [ x | y | block | inline | both ] [ mandatory | proximity ]?

scroll-padding.name: scroll-padding
scroll-padding.percentages: relative to the corresponding dimension of the scroll container’s scrollport
scroll-padding.computedValue: as specified, with lengths made absolute
